About Hack and Help

Code for Good

Connect with motivated hackers and helpers. Solve local problems with global impact.

Two days, three tracks

Spend one weekend to hack education, the refugee crisis and mental health

Attend and be inspired

We strive not only to offer a space for rich discussion but also to serve as a call to action and a springboard for possible solutions.
